channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NC

item.title: Report X-2023071036
item.description:
Report X-2023071036

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-13
  • City: CHARLOTTE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS FOUND IN STATION UNLOAD ON ITS SIDE WITH VISIBLE LEAKAGE ON THE BOX. BOX WAS VISIBLY WET. PKG WAS THEN SECURED AND TAKEN TO QA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. DescribePack: 2 OF THE 4 JUGS WERE MISSING FLUID SO THE CAPS MUST HAVE BEEN LOOSE. NO HOLES IN CONTAINERS. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: BOX WAS PLACED UPRIGHT AND IN A YELLOW HAZMAT DRUM. SECURED IN CAGE.

item.title: Report X-2023071025
item.description:
Report X-2023071025

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-12
  • City: CONCORD
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023071025 SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO US BY THE IC BELT MANAGER. HE NOTICED A LEAK ON THE PACKAGE AND BROUGHT IT OVER TO THE QA CAGE FOR US TO INSPECT. AFTER INSPECTION WE DETERMINED THAT 1 OF THE BOTTLES INSIDE WAS LEAKING AND IT CONTAMINATED THE OTHER 5 BOTTLES IN THE PACKAGE. DescribePack: LOOSE CAP ON ONE OF THE BOTTLES DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: AFTER INSPECTING THE PACKAGE WE MADE SURE THAT THIS DIDNT LEAK OR CONTAMINATE ANY OTHER PACKAGES THEN WE ISOLATED THIS IN A LINED HAZMAT TOTE AND MOVED TO THE HAZMAT CAGE. 2. X-2023071027 SequenceEvent: THE LOAD SIDE MANAGER SAW THIS PACKAGE IN A TOTE AT DOOR 156 AND ASKED US TO COME INSPECT THE PACKAGE. WE DETERMINED THAT 2 OF THE 6 BOTTLES WERE LEAKING AND THEY SPILLED OUT ON THE OTHER 4 BOTTLES INSIDE THE BOX. WE PUT THE PACKAGE IN A LINED HAZMAT TOTE AND ISOLATED IT INSIDE THE HAZMAT CAGE. DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: WE REPSONDED QUICKLY TO THE RADIO CALL AND MADE SURE THAT THIS PACKAGE DIDNT LEAK ON ANY OTHER BOXES. WE THEM MADE SURE TO PLACE THIS IN A LINED HAZMAT TOTE AND MOVED INTO THE HAZMAT CAGE.

item.title: Report X-2023071014
item.description:
Report X-2023071014

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-13
  • City: BRYSON CITY
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package handler went into trailer 838858 and noticed the exterior of HAZMAT was wet. QA was called to inspect. QA took package and placed it in a hazmat bin. No other packages were damaged or wet due to hazmat leak. DescribePack: Loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was placed in hazmat drum and put in the hazmat cage for inspection

Report X-2023070976

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Upon returning to the station, the driver gave the package to QA, saying that it was refused due to being damaged DescribePack: one inner can had a dented cap, causing some release. All three cans were heavily dented. The outer pack was wet along the bottom side. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: The package was taken to the nearest QA cage for further processing.

DescribePack: Loose cap causing leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in plastic bag and hazmat tote and given to QA.

item.title: Report X-2023070858
item.description:
Report X-2023070858

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-08T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-07
  • City: KERNERSVILLE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023070858 SequenceEvent: Package was found on dock with outer contents wet. DescribePack: Package was placed against orientational arrows causing leakage from within DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a salvage drum. 2. X-2023070860 SequenceEvent: Package was found on the dock laying sideways against orientational arrows, and wet. DescribePack: Package was laying against orientational arrows causing leakage for cap closure. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a salvage drum.

item.title: Report X-2023070850
item.description:
Report X-2023070850

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-08T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-07
  • City: DURHAM
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The damaged package was placed in a hazardous materials tote and taken to the hazardous materials staging area away from personnel and other packages. DescribePack: Upon inspection it was noted that one of the plastic jugs of reagent alcohol had a pinhole leak near the bottom causing the contents to leak. There was no packaging in the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The damaged package was placed in a hazardous material drum awaiting disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023070842
item.description:
Report X-2023070842

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-07
  • City: NEWTON
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While unloading trailer, package was wet and brought to QA. It was discovered cap was missing from 1 gallon jug. Package placed in hazmat plastic bag and bin. DescribePack: Box was wet and had hole top side of jug with missing cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Neutralizer placed on spillage.

item.title: Report X-2023070754
item.description:
Report X-2023070754

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-03
  • City: LINCOLNTON
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package came off semi trailer leaking. Packaging was sufficient- package seemed to have been dropped ( or possibly a heavy item placed on top) causing box to crush in on one side. This caused two cans to dent in and one to crack, all liquid leaked out of the one can that was cracked, the other dented can did not leak. The entire package was put into a tote bin and sent to QA. DescribePack: The metal cans dented and one cracked at the corner of the can where it was dented. It was a very small crack, but liquid leaked out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was put into a tote bin, initially taken to QA, I then took the tote bin and moved it to an isolated and well ventilated area. Package was then put into the Hazmat Cage.

item.title: Report X-2023070728
item.description:
Report X-2023070728

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: FedEx Driver report spill when he opened back of delivery van. Hepaco was contacted for on-site Hazmat cleanup. Maelon Asbourne of Hepaco, Charlotte, NC. (704) 390-6690. DescribePack: Plastic tub was turned over in back of delivery van with contents spilling out. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Called Hazmat clean up and driver moved vehicle to location away from building and people.

item.title: Report X-2023070713
item.description:
Report X-2023070713

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-03
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While being loaded, the package was discovered to be wet on the top side. The package was placed under the belt, and QA was informed of its condition and location. DescribePack: The caps of two of the bottles had become loose, causing some fluid to be released and soak the top of the outer packaging. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a hazmat tote and taken to the nearest QA cage for further processing.

item.title: Report X-2023061013
item.description:
Report X-2023061013

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-08
  • City: NEWTON
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Steel drum was hand delivered from unload to driver. Driver stated that upon putting the drum into their van, there was liquid leaking out from underneath the drum onto the ground. DescribePack: Steel drum is leaking towards the bottom of the body. Crease on bottom is leaking out fluid. Crease is not completely sealed leading to spillage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Steel drum was placed in a hazardous material bag and into a plastic tote to prevent damage to other packages. No other packages are damaged from leakage.
